skills.name: Brace
skills.tagline: A skill of defence, hard-headedness, and immobility. Use Brace to weather the ravages of weather, exhaustion, and those that want to see you fall.

skills.name: Break
skills.tagline: A skill of fragments, shockwaves, and hammer-blows. Use Break to smash through stone, metal, and machinery, working against the efforts of civilization.

skills.name: Concoct
skills.tagline: A skill of reactions, essences, and deeper understanding. Use Concoct to collect or distill chemicals, and to unpick the mysteries surrounding the mutative potential of crezzerin.

skills.name: Cook
skills.tagline: A skill of spices and speculation, meats and fruits and heat. Use Cook to prepare meals, brew herbal drinks or alcohol, and render specimens into their most valuable parts.

skills.name: Delve
skills.tagline: A skill of dust, remnants, and forgotten ways. Use Delve to explore the ruins of the old world, traversing barriers and unearthing secrets.

skills.name: Flourish
skills.tagline: A skill of showmanship, rhythm, and performance. Use Flourish to enchant, impress, or dazzle those around you, worming your way into their heart with words and deeds.

skills.name: Hack
skills.tagline: A skill of sweat, sap, and serrated blades. Use Hack to carve a path right through the wilderness of the rustling waves, imposing order on chaotic growth.

skills.name: Harvest
skills.tagline: A skill of reaping, gleaning, and culling. Use Harvest to gather fruits, flowers, and other edibles from the wild waves, and to understand the flow and cycles of nature.

skills.name: Hunt
skills.tagline: A skill of observation, marksmanship, and precise action. Use Hunt to turn the tables on the sea's many predators, and pick the best of their trophies.

skills.name: Outwit
skills.tagline: A skill of shadows and secrets well-kept. Use Outwit to avoid threats, or to move them right to where you want them.

skills.name: Rattle
skills.tagline: A skill of mending, maintenance, and adaptation. Use Rattle to weave oddments and salvage into workable equipment in a pinch, or to tinker with gear and objects.

skills.name: Scavenge
skills.tagline: A skill of searching, spit, and polish. Use Scavenge to root out valuable salvage from dross, to pick treasure from trash.

skills.name: Sense
skills.tagline: A skill of glances, insight, and intuition. Use Sense to push your awareness of the world past its usual limits, both in terms of environmental awareness and social understanding.

skills.name: Study
skills.tagline: A skill of meticulous recording and focused investigation. Use Study to learn the import of details others would miss, make connections, and sort information.

skills.name: Sway
skills.tagline: A skill of convincing, arguing, and capitulating with aplomb. Use Sway to convince others to act or hold back from acting, or to change hearts and minds to suit your purposes.

skills.name: Tend
skills.tagline: A skill of healing, sustenance, and recovery. Use Tend to heal injuries to the crew, nurture plants, and soothe the minds of both beasts and your fellow crewmates.

skills.name: Vault
skills.tagline: A skill of dizzying heights and impressive acrobatics. Use Vault to climb, leap, and tumble your way through an environment at speed.

skills.name: Wavewalk
skills.tagline: A skill of seared soles, brachiation, and animalistic elegance. Use Wavewalk to personally navigate the wilds without the use of a ship, despite the danger.

languages.name: Low Sour
languages.tagline: Mongrel common tongue spoken across the waves by sailors from shattered cultures.

languages.name: Raka Spit
languages.tagline: Rapid hunting-family patter with incredible descriptive depth for beasts and leviathans.

languages.name: Chthonic
languages.tagline: Ancient human language reunifying from thousands of dialects, rich in spirit-knowledge and ardent lore.

languages.name: Lyre-Bite
languages.tagline: Lilting poetic tongue suited for performances, songs, and understanding ancient whispers.

languages.name: Saprekk
languages.tagline: Thick, unchanged ektus tongue; learning it earns great respect from desert peoples.

languages.name: Old Hand
languages.tagline: Entirely gestural pre-Verdancy language for the quiet, preserving knowledge of lost relics.

languages.name: Gaudimm
languages.tagline: Chemical gau language using twitches, clicks, and pheromones for complex cave-dwelling concepts.

languages.name: Signaling
languages.tagline: Visual flag-and-flare code known by travelers, military, and smugglers for ship communication.

languages.name: Knock
languages.tagline: Hissing tzelicrae hive-mind speech; outsiders speak simplified versions with gestures and insect wisdom.

languages.name: Highvin
languages.tagline: Exceedingly difficult written language from pre-verdant ruins, deciphered by scholars and treasure-hunters.

languages.name: Brasstongue
languages.tagline: Clipped trader language adapted from ancient punch-cards, favored by merchants and grifters.

journeyRoles.name: At the helm
journeyRoles.instructions:
Navigate the ship through the wilds.
• Make Cut rolls to steer through obstacles
• Respond to hazards ahead with quick decisions
• Keep the ship on course toward your destination

journeyRoles.name: On watch
journeyRoles.instructions:
Keep an eye out for danger and opportunities.
• Make Sense rolls to spot threats and landmarks
• Alert the crew to approaching hazards
• Maintain situational awareness of surroundings

journeyRoles.name: Cartographising
journeyRoles.instructions:
Map the journey and chart the surrounding wilds.
• Make Study rolls to accurately chart your course
• Record landmarks, discoveries, and safe routes
• Improve future navigation through the same area

journeyRoles.name: Tend the engine
journeyRoles.instructions:
Maintain the ship's propulsion systems.
• Make Build rolls to keep the engine running smoothly
• Respond quickly to mechanical failures
• Optimize speed and fuel efficiency

journeyRoles.name: Watch the weather
journeyRoles.instructions:
Monitor environmental conditions and patterns.
• Make Sense rolls to predict weather changes
• Warn the crew of incoming storms or phenomena
• Help the crew adapt to changing conditions

journeyRoles.name: Tend the Garden
journeyRoles.instructions:
Manage the ship's food production and provisions.
• Make Flourish rolls for successful cultivation
• Maintain crew morale through good food
• Prevent spoilage and manage shortages
